Voter Information

Important Election Dates

  • Aug 23, 2025

    Last day to register to vote in the Preliminary Election

  • Sep 2, 2025

    Preliminary Election

    (Polls Open 7 a.m. - 8 p.m.)

  • Oct 25, 2025

    Last day to register to vote in the Municipal Election

  • Nov 4, 2025

    Municipal Election

    (Polls Open 7 a.m. - 8 p.m.)

  • Find My Polling Location

  • Register To Vote

    - Or make changes to your current registration

Community Resources

LGBTQIA+

  • Trans Lifeline:

    877-565-8860 | translifeline.org

  • The Trevor Project:

    1-866-488-7386 | thetrevorproject.org

  • LGBTQ National Help Center:

    888-843-4564 | lgbthotline.org

  • 988 Lifeline:

    LGBTQIA+ Trained Crisis Counselor | 988lifeline.org
    Call 988 and press 3 OR: Text PRIDE to 988

  • Crisis Text Line:

    Text HOME to 741-741 | crisistextline.org

  • DeQH Helpline:

    908-367-3374 | degh.org

  • LGBTQ Asylum Seekers:

  • Community Legal Aid:

    communitylegal.org

  • Worcester Refugee Assistance Project:

    worcesterrefugees.org

  • The PAIR Project:

    pairproject.org
